head.supplied: ¶ [Requesting that a sum may be transferred from No. 82 £1800 for fencing for the erection of a new Bridge at the Garden]...

div.p: No. 4904, vol. 1859 K, VPRS 1168 registers of inward correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, dated 19 May 1859. This letter was also registered in the Public Works Department: Nos 2984 and 3647, Unit 5, VPRS 963, Pubilc Record Office, Victoria.
[Requesting that a sum may be transferred from No. 82 £1800 for fencing for the erection of a new Bridge at the Garden]
M to G. Horne, 3 May 1859 (in this edition as59-05-03a) had pointed out the dangerous state of the existing bridge; see also T. Balmain to M, 10 May 1859. On 22 June 1859 the Chief Secretary's Department informed the Public Works Department: 'May be charged agnst vote 45'.
